alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Ascension, central St. James and northeastern Assumption Parishes through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gonzales, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, Geismar, Convent and Belle Rose. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 174 and 190. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; St. James; Western Ascension
